mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_free (free_title, free_writer, free_content) VALUES (#{ free_title }, #{ free_writer }, #{ free_content })
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_FREE_NO, FREE_TITLE, FREE_WRITER, FREE_READCOUNT, FREE_DATE, FREE_DELETED FROM BOARD_FREE ORDER BY BOARD_FREE_NO DESC
SELECT BOARD_FREE_NO, FREE_TITLE, FREE_CONTENT, FREE_WRITER, FREE_DATE, FREE_READCOUNT FROM BOARD_FREE WHERE BOARD_FREE_NO = #{ board_free_no } AND FREE_DELETED = FALSE
SELECT BOARD_FREE_NO, FREE_TITLE, FREE_WRITER, FREE_READCOUNT, FREE_DATE, FREE_DELETED FROM BOARD_FREE ORDER BY BOARD_FREE_NO DESC LIMIT #{ from }, #{ cnt }
